attributes.action: stop fathers from killing their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the public are becoming more aware of domestic abuse. how ever the law doesnt seem to undrestand that children are dying through judges giving access to abusive fathers. these men dont deserve to see their children. 
some men only hit their wifes/partners but it still affects childen. it is still child abuse, it affects the childen mentally.
all children deserve to grow up in an abusive FREE enviroment. 
alot of women put up with the abuse because their is no support from the courts, goverment, who ever you want to blame.
HOW MANY MORE CHILDREN WILL DIE BEFORE YOU AS PRIME MINISTER SAYS NO MORE, AND CHANGES THE LAW .  
mr gordon brown you can change everything please change the law before my own nephews end up on the front page of the paper( another father kills children. )my sisters ex threatened that he would do this . please i beg you please stop it from happening again and again.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
